name: Humane Harvest
description: Our Organic Omega-3 eggs come from hens raised in free roaming environments and fed a special organic diet that contains flax seedâ€”a grain naturally high in Omega-3 fatty acids.

blocks.name: Humane Harvest
text: Our Humane Harvest eggs come from hens raised in free roaming environments and fed a pure vegetarian diet consisting of premium grains, seeds & meal.
These are happy hens that can walk around, scratch in the sunlight and enjoy plenty of fresh air and water. Naturally, they produce healthier and tastier eggs for all of us.

blocks.heading: Better For Our Hens
blocks.subheading: Our pasture raised hens enjoy the outdoors and all the benefits that come with the freedom to roam wild and free.

blocks.heading: Better For Our Eggs
blocks.subheading: Natural pastures, plants and bugs - what else could be better for a hen? That's why pasture raised eggs are more flavorful and nutricious!

blocks.heading: Better For You
blocks.subheading: Happier hens make higher quality eggs to support a healthier you. It's that simple.
